title: Optimize Mine Haulage Profile
description: A planning engineer analyzes the mine's haulage routes and production schedule to optimize truck fleet requirements over the next year.

tasks.description: Import the mine production schedule for the next year, showing the location and tonnage of all material to be moved.
tasks.expected_outcome: The production data is loaded into the haulage simulation tool.

tasks.description: Model the haulage network, including all roads and their characteristics (e.g., length, gradient).
tasks.expected_outcome: A digital twin of the mine's haulage network is created.

tasks.description: Run a simulation to calculate the required truck hours for each month and determine the optimal number of trucks needed in the fleet.
tasks.expected_outcome: The simulation provides a forecast of the required truck fleet size, identifying a need for two additional trucks in Q3.
